33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Anas bin Malik narrated that the Messenger of Allah(s.a.w) said:"There shall come upon the people a time in which the one who is patient upon his religion will be like the one holding onto a burning ember

chapter.eng-name: The One Who Is Patient Upon His Religion During Fitan Is like One Holding An Ember
